algorithms.graph
Class StronglyConnectedComponents<NodeType extends model.interfaces.INode<NodeType>>

  algorithms.graph.StronglyConnectedComponents<NodeType>
Type Parameters:
NodeType - The node type used in the graph
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<java.util.Set<NodeType>>
public class StronglyConnectedComponents<NodeType extends model.interfaces.INode<NodeType>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<java.util.Set<NodeType>>

An implementation of tarjans algorithm for finding the SCC of a graph. Description available at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tarjan%27 s_strongly_connected_components_algorithm

Constructor Summary
StronglyConnectedComponents(model.interfaces.IGraph<NodeType> graph)
          Computes the strongly connected components and stores them in the object.
